snippet.title: League of Pixels - 2D MOBA [Steam Release Trailer]
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1198760/League_of_Pixels/

The time has come, League of Pixels will finally be released on Steam!
Challenge your friends or strangers in this 1vs1 pixel art MOBA game. Pick one out of many playable characters and proof to be the better player!

Currently playable here:
 https://kingdanius.itch.io/league-of-pixels-2d-moba

The game is and will stay 100% free to play and supports Online Multiplayer, Local Splitscreen Multiplayer and Offline Singleplayer, so you'll always find the right mode for the current situation!
